titleStmt.title: The true and everlasting rule from God discovered and that which proveth all things, published from the spirit of truth, to the which rule the Scriptures also beareth testimony, that all the simple and honest-hearted may see what rule they are to walk by to come to perfect peace and rest with God for evermore : with an addition (to the former) wherein is also shewed, what that is in man which is not to be his guide nor rule : also, a testimony of the true prophet ... / by a servant of the Lord, & sufferer for his truth ... called Humphrey Smith.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Humphrey, d. 1663.
W. B.

notesStmt.note: "Concerning that which overcomes and prevails with God" (p. 45-46) signed: W.B.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
